options.content: Google Trends

targets.rawSql:
SELECT * 
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.GoogleTrends.realtime_trends_clean` 
WHERE 
--  category ='Business'
  category = 'Headlines'
--  category = 'Science_Tech'
--  category = 'Sport'
--  category = 'Entertainment'
--  category = 'Health'
AND tmstp = 
  (SELECT MAX(tmstp) 
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.GoogleTrends.realtime_trends_clean`)
ORDER BY rank

SELECT
  keyword as trend, rank
FROM
  `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.GoogleTrends.realtime_trends_r`
--timestamp = DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 0 DAY) 
WHERE  EXTRACT(DATE FROM DATETIME(timestamp, "Europe/Berlin")) = EXTRACT(DATE FROM DATETIME_SUB(CURRENT_DATE("Europe/Berlin"), INTERVAL 1 DAY))  
AND category = "Headlines"
--DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE()\, INTERVAL  1 DAY),
LIMIT
  50

query.rawSql:
WITH nutzer AS (
  SELECT
CASE
    WHEN CONTAINS_SUBSTR("${__user.login}", "dev") THEN "dev"
    WHEN CONTAINS_SUBSTR("${__user.login}", "mefo") THEN "mefo"
    WHEN CONTAINS_SUBSTR("${__user.email}", "@") THEN
      REGEXP_EXTRACT("${__user.email}", r'@([^\.]+)')  -- Extracts part after '@' and before the first '.' Example: ad.westphal@ndr.de => ndr
    WHEN NOT CONTAINS_SUBSTR("${__user.email}", "@")
         AND (CONTAINS_SUBSTR("${__user.email}", "viewer") 
         OR CONTAINS_SUBSTR("${__user.email}", "podcast")) THEN
            REGEXP_EXTRACT("${__user.email}", r'^([^-\s]+)')  -- Extracts part before the first '-'. Example: ndr-viewer => ndr
    ELSE
      "Anonym"
  END AS nutzer_lra
),
filter_string AS (
  SELECT """
nofilter
""" AS filter
)

SELECT CONCAT(
  "https://vqggwrz.pa-cd.com/event?s=645199&idclient=minerva&events=%5B%7B%22name%22%3A%22page.display%22%2C%22data%22%3A%7B%22page%22%3A%22",
  "${__dashboard.name}",
  "%22%2C%22m_visits%22%3A1%2C%22minerva_dashboard_id%22%3A%22",
  "${__dashboard.uid}",
  "%22%2C%22minerva_lra%22%3A%22",
  nutzer.nutzer_lra,
  "%22%2C%22minerva_filter%22%3A%22",
  filter_string.filter,
  "%22%7D%7D%5D"
) AS event_url
FROM nutzer, filter_string
